Methodology

How We Estimate Claude

Primary method: ARR Ã· blended price. With $14B ARR, assuming 70% API revenue ($9.8B/yr), at ~$3/M blended token price: $9.8B Ã· $3/M Ã· 365 = ~9T/day.

Cross-validation â€” MAU method: 18M MAU Ã— avg 500K tokens/day (enterprise-heavy usage) = ~9T/day. Consistent with ARR method.

Cross-validation â€” Request volume: 820M API requests/day (Jun 2025) Ã— avg 10K tokens/request = 8.2T/day. Extrapolated to Feb 2026 at +8%/mo = ~12T. This gives the upper bound.

Key uncertainty: Blended pricing. Claude Code (long-context, high-token) vs Haiku (cheap, low-token) creates a wide range. At $1.5/M â†’ 18T/day. At $6/M â†’ 4.5T/day. We use $3/M as midpoint.

Claude Code factor: Claude Code ($2.5B ARR sub-product) drives extremely high per-user token consumption due to large context windows. Estimated 30-40% of total tokens.

GATT estimate: ~7-10T/day, midpoint ~10T.
